sections.heading: Duty
sections.text:
to develop process for claiming eligibility for services and benefits provided

to displaced persons or businesses by governmental body.

sections.heading: Duty
sections.text:
to provide certain administrative services and written notice to persons who

may be displaced.

sections.heading: Duty
sections.text:
to adopt policies to provide relocation assistance and make relocation

payments.

sections.heading: Payments
sections.text:
of certain costs, fees and sums to persons displaced as result of acquisition

of property by or on behalf of redevelopment agency; exceptions; other

appropriate action which allows relocation to comparable location.

sections.heading: Period
sections.text:
for making payments of benefits; payment to third party upon request;

establishment of administrative appeal process for grievances.

sections.heading: Applicability
sections.text:
ofNRS 342.015to342.065, inclusive; discretion of

governmental body to pay increased benefits; regulations governing

interpretation of certain words or phrases.

sections.heading: Compliance
sections.text:
with federal law required; adoption of regulations by Director of Department of

Transportation.
